name: ZKSAFE
intro: A kind of Safebox with password+private key
introduce: ZKSAFE has created a kind of Safebox with password+private key to open, even if the private key is stolen, the asset remains safe. Users can have their own Safebox contracts, which can be understood as their own private banks. Users can retrieve your assets even if they lost private key and password by social recovery. Users only need to install ZKSAFE extension, and no hard wallet is needed.
